extendedInfo.description: Something powerful, something elegant, something valuable! It is Dolphin BrowserÂ® Mini.Something fast, something simple, something new! It is Dolphin Browser Mini.Browsing made wonderful.Dolphin BrowserÂ® Mini aims at providing a friendly user experience for all of you. Enjoy this new version now and let us know how it works for you. Highlights:*High speed responsibility*Speed Dial Homepage*Innovative Menu design*Infinite tabs browsing*Intelligent back & forward button*Powerful Copy Text (Select Text)Features:*Gesture*Multi-tab browsing*Multi-touch pinch zoom*Tool Box*RSS Detection*Bookmarks sync*Bookmarks/History/Most Visited*Flash Support for Froyo

reviews.title: Two important features are missing
reviews.comment: This is one of the best of all android browsers. However, the feature \"Request Desktop Site\" is missing. Or maybe I\'m not finding it! Additionally, \"Night Mode\" ( white text on black background) for web pages is missing. I\'m waiting to rate this app 5 stars when these two features are added.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Zooming problem on JB 4.1.1
reviews.comment: A few years ago, I found my web browser. In fact, this is the only browser I\'ve ever used. However, I\'ve just updated my Nexus S to JB 4.1.1 and the zooming function by pinching doesn\'t work. The zoom-in/zoom-out button is also gone even though I have it enabled. I can zoom in/out by double-tap but I don\'t like it because it\'s either too big or too small. I\'m temporarily using DB with Dolphin Engine (beta), but I\'m still missing DB Mini. Please fix it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, fast, but...
reviews.comment: This lightweight browser could be best for older devices. Unfortunately, text selection and pinch to zoom is not working for my Galaxy S under CyanogenMod 10.1. Please fix!
reviews.author: Wolfgang Welz

reviews.title: Missing Two Things
reviews.comment: 1) Need to be able to hide back and forward buttons in the bottom left. 2) Needs the Dolphin Connect thing. When I browse on my phone, sending webpages to my PC is one of the most useful features ever.
reviews.author: Levi Waters

reviews.title: Almost good.
reviews.comment: Most of functions work well except when I am on Facebook, it cannot view any vdo and it cannot zoom by pinch. Today, unable to facebook anymore, crashed without any popup. Transparent popup navigation buttons (back & fwd) is great!
reviews.author: Pat Pattrapong

reviews.title: Better than Dolphin Browser
reviews.comment: Really cool, quick launch, fast, simple yet powerful,  I have uninstalled all other browsers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Mobile Browser
reviews.comment: Finally a mobile browser designed perfectly for a smartphone. Very fast, easy access to the most used features, the quickest tab navigating experience on a phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great browser alternative, but...
reviews.comment: Small, fast, add much better than the default browser. More stable than the full size version. However, had anyone else experienced zombie tabs? Tabs that, after they are closed, appear again when the browser is brought back to the front. They only go away for good when you exit the browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Fast, easy to use, modern and slick. Brilliant app :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, fast, better
reviews.comment: I liked Dolphin hd, but it had a lot of stuff, i like to keep it simple, best browser ever!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome. Hell yeah
reviews.comment: Far better than Dolphin HD and Opera Mini. And the best part is HTML 5 support, which was available on Opera Mobile(size 14mb) while this is just around 1mb.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good !
reviews.comment: I think it\'s better than dolphin browser . Simple , useful , I love it !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked great on Droid Incredible.
reviews.comment: Great browser. I actually like this better than the HD version. Good privacy settings, too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Ok
reviews.author: Joe Do

reviews.title: Great! But...
reviews.comment: This Browser is Awesome! Fast, flexible. But, still Heavy and forced \'Force Close\' at my G-Young. Please make it more Smoothly.

reviews.title: Excellent !!
reviews.comment: This is what I was looking for..a light weight browser for my android, and its lightening fast as well ... Keep it up developer all the best..
reviews.author: Vipul Solanki

reviews.title: Fast browser
reviews.comment: This is a nice, easy to use mobile browser. Good for saving bandwidth. Although, I\'ve yet to find an option for inverted background or black and white browsing. The stock Samsung webkit browser has that.
reviews.author: Eddie Tam

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: Runs ten times better than the normal verson. I just miss voice search and a youtube windows (in forums and websites) don\'t show up.
reviews.author: Michael DiFranco

reviews.title: Great browser, highly recommended
reviews.comment: It\'s very fast and stable, 5 stars very well earned and possible the best browser available for Android.
reviews.author: Juan Recabarren

reviews.title: It\'s Spectacular :-D
reviews.comment: I love it. It\'s very fast. Although it would be great to crop screencuts before saving or sending. Other then that.... I\'m satisfied. :-)
reviews.author: Regina Franklin
